articles.title: Dolly Parton to donate $1 million to Hurricane Helene relief efforts
articles.description: Dolly Parton announced a $1 million donation to the Mountain Ways Foundation to assist victims of Hurricane Helene.

articles.title: Garth Brooks accused of rape in lawsuit
articles.description: A hair and makeup artist alleges that country music star Garth Brooks raped her five years ago in a Los Angeles hotel; Brooks denies the claims.

articles.title: Bruce Springsteen endorses Harris, condemns Trump
articles.description: Rock star Bruce Springsteen spoke out in a video, endorsing Harris and stating that Trump should be disqualified from ever being president again.
